definition: contrary to or prohibited by or defiant of law
details:
adjective
- contrary to or prohibited by or defiant of law
= example: contrary to or prohibited by or defiant of law
- contrary to or forbidden by law
= synonyms: outlaw, illegitimate, illicit, outlawed
- having no legally established claim
= synonyms: wrongful
- not morally right or permissible
= example: not morally right or permissible
- not conforming to legality, moral law, or social convention
= synonyms: improper
